Review Text: We are not in Mankato a lot, so we are not very familiar with the restaurants here. Nolabelle was one of the first ones to pop on my Google search, so we decided to try it. ‚Ä¶

Absolutely hands down my top 5 favorite French dips. And atmosphere and bartender is a vibe! Amazing local restaurant.
10 stars!!
Great service and fantastic food! My friend got the Roasted Wild Mushroom + Burrata Toast, I tried the Eggs and Grit, and then we split a piece of the Pain Perdu, it was all SO GOOD!

Food was good nothing to rave about. Stir clear of the poached pear it‚Äôs a battle to eat. It‚Äôs good but for us not worth trying to cut it up to eat it.
The table was dirty, sticky, and the lamps are covered in dust. There was also a ‚Ä¶

My friend and I wanted to try somewhere new and fun so we came in for dinner. Great atmosphere and our waitress was super friendly and attentive considering how busy they were with outdoor patrons. We had the short rib egg rolls and they ‚Ä¶

Our dinner at Nolabelle was absolutely wonderful! We sat outside on a perfect fall evening and enjoyed a couple of cocktails followed by their delectable Short Rib Egg Rolls. They were so delicious and filling that we each got a salad. We ‚Ä¶
Farm to Table quality of food. Wish I had an appetite for more things off the menu to try. Avocado toasts - So delicious and not your basic toast. Feels like you‚Äôre in Minneapolis. ‚Ä¶

We had a large group this weekend and they handled us like absolute champs!! The service was wonderful. The Thai Peanut + Pork Belly Salad was really really good (although some of the pork was too dry). Some of the girls thought their ‚Ä¶

Had a great lunch yesterday at Nolabelle.
This is  a very easy review to write.  Staff and server excellent (Emma), food was creative and delicious ( spring roll appetizer, lamb pitas, apple salad with ‚Ä¶

Not often do I find the perfect place.  Amazing apps. The best Cuban I have ever had and the drinks were delicious.  I will be back and you should give it a try and let me know what you think! I highly recommend the charcuterie board!  The mustard should be bottled and sold.

Food was burnt, the chicken was dry and tasted like fish, the food took a while and we saw it just sitting on the counter for quite a bit. When it arrived to our table it was barely warm. They tried to explain some of the reason why it ‚Ä¶
Wow! My girlfriend found this place and made reservations for a date night for us. We live about an hour away. Somehow had never heard of this establishment. ‚Ä¶

Best grilled cheese I‚Äôve ever had! Sweet (peaches), savory (bacon), spicy (jalape√±o) and - the most brilliant part - goat cheese! Never had anything like it. So glad I tried it! My husband had shrimp and grits and that was very good too. We ‚Ä¶
Fantastic, unique food! Great service and delicious craft cocktails! Fun find on a college visit!

First time,  food was very tasty & esthetically pleasing to the eye. I had the buffalo chicken street tacos. I especially liked the thin corn taco shells & my friend had roasted Brussels sprouts.  Have a few extra shillings in your pocket & ‚Ä¶
Stumbled across this place while traveling through on our way to South Dakota. The food was fantastic. The cocktails were excellent, and the service was extremely friend would highly recommend.
The round is over. They brought the heat. We have a victor. Winner Winner, Chicken Dinner.  And the Nolabelle tolls for its own victory... ;) ‚Ä¶

This place is awesome!  We were impressed with everything (the open and clean space, the food, the servers) and how so much thought was put into this restaurant. I'm particular to a good eggs benny, and theirs was excellent, with pieces of ‚Ä¶

My boyfriend had the biscuits and gravy and I had the chicken and waffles. My boyfriend's loved the biscuits and gravy, and the eggs that it came with. He also really enjoyed the Wired Russian he got. The chicken and waffles was amazing. ‚Ä¶

We go here for all our special events. Everything on the menu is delicious from the cocktails (both N/A and alcoholic). We can't help but order dessert every time. The vegan tres leches is amazingly good and so is the chocolate torte. ‚Ä¶

Hands down the best place to eat in the southern part of MN!! Well worth the drive if you don‚Äôt live in Mankato. The best customer service I‚Äôve had that is always consistently good. The food is also very consistent. ‚Ä¶
I was pleasantly surprised by this restaurant.  I was previously unaware of it, even though I was familiar with the larger Mankato area. ‚Ä¶

Kind of strange food but on the other hand it was something different and healthy.. That squash steak is amazing.... That :) dark haired waitress we had was just sweet as could be... I would definitely go back...

We stopped in before a Maverick hockey game without a reservation and luckily got seated right away. It sure seems like they have the culture figured out here. Every employee was attentive and kind. The food was all ridiculously good! I ‚Ä¶

We went there for lunch after seeing all the reviews. It's a gorgeous place, very quaint, all food came beautifully presented. Flavorwise, the Arugula & Apple salad was absolutely fantastic, very well seasoned, fresh and exciting! The ‚Ä¶

Personally Nolabelle isn't for me. Their menu comes off a bit pretentious, like it's trying to hard. But that's my opinion. For the facts. Their wait staff is great, my wife had a hair in her blackened salmon and they made her a new one ‚Ä¶
I'll first start out by saying we've been to Nolabelle a few times for brunch and quite liked it. Tonight we decided to try it out for dinner and we left feeling let down. ‚Ä¶

Menu was fantastic great selection. Service was fast and friendly
We had charcuterie platter, Burrata Caprese and shrimp cakes! Absolutely delicious. Highly recommend

We stopped here for espresso and dessert after all the other espresso cafes were closed.  Excellent service, atmosphere, espresso, and bread pudding.  Comfortable outdoor seating area for warm weather dining.

Always fantastic food and service. One waitress remembered that she had served me on my birthday multiple months prior. Always a fun time with me and my roommates here (: I love their cocktails, burrata, and this one sandwich they have with au jus

Our server, Charlotte did a great job helping with our special request! She helped us reveal the gender of our baby. The food was delicious, the service was great and it's always an enjoyable atmosphere. Nolabelle is one of our favorite date night locations.

Great staff, tasty food and a real buzz. Our first visit and it won't be the last. Well prepared and presented lunch featuring house made components, the freshest ingredients (flavorful lamb and amazing burrata) and generous portions. ‚Ä¶

One of my favorite Mankato restaurants! Brunch on the weekends is always excellent but great spot for lunch and dinner too. Great trendy vibe with a fresh menu. The pain perdu and eggs Benny are my favorites for brunch. Butter baked walleye ‚Ä¶

You could taste the freshness of everything. I really appreciated the fact that there was a very nice mocktail menu (I had to ask for it separately, but many places don't even have one). There is no need to settle for a Shirley Temple or ‚Ä¶
Hands down my favorite breakfast spot. I wish I could eat here every day! Such a fun twist on all their menu items. The pan perdue   and avocado toast are my favorites!
Viva took such good care of us. Kids loved Mac n cheese so much we ordered two! Truffle chips are so good. Finished the night with butter cake! Excellent food and service!

This place was great. The food was absolutely amazing. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. I highly recommend this restaurant. Very, very impressed, all around. I also really like the atmosphere there. It's a very bright and open. Lots of windows that really open the place up. Again, I recommend this place.
Food was great. I came with coworkers and got the burnt ends and roasted brussel spouts as appetizers. I ended with the roasted chicken legs for my main dish and omg so good! ‚Ä¶

Came in for breakfast and the bartender recommended the Lemon Ricotta pancakes (I‚Äôm not really a lemon fan) but I went for it. He also recommended the jalape√±o grits so naturally I ordered that to! WOW! Fantastic meal! Mimosa was excellent, ‚Ä¶

I had the Shortie French Dip for lunch, and it was perfect. The bread was soft, the au jus was homemade and perfect, the meat was tender and flavorful, and the aioli had just a hint of horseradish. Ten out of ten! Excellent service from everyone, too.
I came in last Sunday and the food and service was fantastic! Shout out to my server Emma F. For the great service!! We will definitely be back for another great meal!!!

Hands down!!! I had a chicken- kale-apple slaw  plate for dinner and it was amazing! Their grits are one of the best I‚Äôve ever hadüëå Plus a mojito drink and it was delicious.  Now for dessert I had a ‚Äúmint chocolate ice cream‚Äù üç® and it was ‚Ä¶

I have been to Nolabelle twice now and enjoyed it immensely both times. The thing that stands out for me is the service.  The waitstaff is attentive. The bar staff are engaging and fun.  The cocktail menu is creative, has variety and is reasonably priced. The food is also very good with a broad variety of choices. I highly recommend

My wife got the pork chop and loved it.  I thought it was a little bland.  I got the steak and fries.  Now, I will say they were the best fries I've probably ever had.  The steak on the other hand was ok, nothing special.. I doubt it was a ‚Ä¶

Reservation wasn‚Äôt honored. Was not late for early reservation and business wasn‚Äôt busy. Made a reservation that would make my dining experience pleasurable because of a physical limitation. Should have just left instead of sitting in pain.
Loved the appetizers, we had the roasted Brussel sprouts.  Each of our party of six loved their main courses.  I had the baked walleye over rizzoto and capers.  Loved it.

Very nice. Excellent food. Our waiter was good however noticed the service wasn‚Äôt a team effort. Think I would have a different vibe if everyone worked together. Still a good experience and definitely recommend.

Visited on a weekday noon time, end of July. I'm solely going to address the Cubano sandwich and sevice in this review as they were the most agregious failure of the meal, nevermind the rest of the meal and its shortcomings. The Cubano was ‚Ä¶

Great food, amazing flavor and very filling definitely won't leave hungry. Their Bloodies are outstanding. The candied bacon is phenomenal. Very warm and friendly staff. A must stop and try if you're in the downtown area.

Wow, if you haven‚Äôt tried this place it‚Äôs a must.  Young chef from SD and he knows what he‚Äôs doing!  Food was unbelievably good, drinks were fantastic, and the host and wait staff were amazing.  Menu is terrific too, great variety with unique flavors. I sincerely can‚Äôt wait to go back.

Great bar-style pizza in a no-frills atmosphere. Absolutely loved it! It was busy but a booth opened up for my wife and I quickly. You‚Äôre walk in and find an open seat. The staff were very friendly. Pictured here is the four cheese pizza and that was our favorite. Crummy picture because I was so excited to eat it.

We stopped in on a whim while randomly visiting Mankato and this place was a well oiled machine. Friday night & super busy, but they were slinging pies fast and had very good servers. We arrived at the right time and got the last seats ‚Ä¶

Wonderful Pizza, think the deep dish is the favorite! Paige our amazing server was spot on! Can't wait for another trip!
Trip 2  (4/2/24) was just as amazing. Favorite pizza EVER! (Service still amazing as well!) 12/18, still fabulous! Tried the taco this time, hubby loves it!

Stopped in on my way back from a road trip around 5pm on a Sunday in November. Wanted an order of cheese bread, like we got after bar close back in college. Took 30 minutes and they knew I was waiting but didn't tell me when it was ready. Cheese bread was good, not great. Might be the last visit to Pags üò¢ ‚Ä¶

Popped in here on a complete whim wanting lunch amidst our cross country road trip. We were not disappointed! Knowing Mankato is a college town we were not surprised that this place was virtually empty midsummer, midweek, at noon. Despite ‚Ä¶
This joint feels like a New York pizza place, but the employees and patrons are Midwest nice! Watch the pizzaiolos make each pie in the outside window or from the counter. ‚Ä¶

I had Pagliai's Taco Pizza delivered this evening. Best taco pizza EVER!  It was so yummy!!  The person taking my order on the phone and the delivery person were exceptionally pleasant but then I have come to expect that from Pagliai's.  I ‚Ä¶

Had a pretty good lunch here yesterday.  The spaghetti was just a little wetter than I like, but still good. The Taco Pizza was ok but I probably wouldn‚Äôt order it again. My buddy loved the Philly Cheesesteak and says it could be one of the best he‚Äôs ever eaten. I would come back again if I was in the area.
Town favorite and best deep pizza in Mankato! Forget the chains and eat like the locals in Southern Minnesota.

Only been there once for lunch. The lunch special for $7 is a great deal (small one topping pizza).  Outside is cute. Inside is functional.  Staff was friendly.  Was pretty busy.  Thin crust.  Parking was the hardest part. I am excited to take my family back there.

I go here every time I go to Mankato.  The pizza is absolutely phenomenal. Barbecue chicken is my fav. My bud gets there spaghetti whenever he goes with me. Massive portion. We get the same dude here comes and helps us every time.  think he ‚Ä¶
One of the oldest and best pizza places in Mankato! They have a great lunch specials as well. You can't go wrong getting food from here!
Great food! Drive 40 minutes one way to eat this as much as possible. Favorite pizza around.

Pagliai's was our first stop while visiting my boyfriends college town of Mankato and 16 years later, he says it's the exact same as he had remembered it. we sat at his favorite booth way in the back and ordered a 10" taco and 10" philly ‚Ä¶
Great food and a great price and staffed by outstanding and friendly wait staff. Mankato's oldest pizzeria is still as great as it was when I first stepped foot in it back in 1978.....

Called for a pizza, asking about time for delivery or take out. Guy who I TT was very short and sarcastic. Sounded irritated, as if I was inconveniencing him to even call and order.  Once order was placed he didn't even repeat it back to me ‚Ä¶

Pizza was good.  Seriously stretchy cheese.  Thursday and Sunday special was a pitcher of Michelob for $0.25/0.50/0.75 PITCHER with sm/med/large pizza.  It was busy, a little noisy and took a while to get service and food, understandably, but still a little slow after much of the crowd dispersed.  Servers were courteous and very nice.

People and food were great.  Staff seemed a little overwhelmed and it did take a long time.  To order and get our food was about an hour and a half.  However it was the marathon weekend so may have just been a nontypical weekend.
Holy buckets! Great choice tonight. Got The Works and am loving each bite. Ingredients are super fresh! Not easy to eat... making it a messy fun date with the hubby. ‚Ä¶

Ive tried many a slice in town, and nothing has come close to the perfection of this pizza! I can't even decide what part is my favorite.. the cheese that's browned beautifully so the flavors pop? Or maybe the sauce that's not too heavy or too light? It could be the crust that i wish never ended. I've never had a better pizza!

Great pizza and great service. I was there in the mid-afternoon so it was not busy but seemed steady with delivery and 4 or 5 tables eating in. I had the works minus green olives, green peppers and mushrooms. It was well made, well ‚Ä¶
Old school Mankato staple with a pizza lunch special that's fast & hard to beat! Cheesebread is always a yes! Family owned & operated. Friendly staff. Excellent pizza!

Great pizza- loved to sauce & crisp crust- perfect amount of toppings. Got a table right away at 4:45 and place was filled up by 6pm.
The Sunday special was a pleasant surprise.  25 cent pitcher of beer with a large pizza. Wow!

Used to to be the best pizza in town, recently has had the worst customer service I have ever dealt with. It‚Äôs lucky that I have sentimental value in this place or I‚Äôd give it a lower mark. But all I have to say is I‚Äôd rather order dominoes over dealing with the dramatic staff.
Always great pizzas!!! Quality ingredients and taste. A MUST stop.
The best pizza pizza in town when me and my bf go here or order we never have had a bad pie and everyone is nice

Used to work there under the former owners (Flansburg's). Stopped in today and have to say, service has gotten worse, and because of that, I couldn't stay for the food, which is always good.  Was last week from the Pagliai's in Grinnell, IA ‚Ä¶
Works Deep dish with added Jalape√±os. One of the best pizzas I‚Äôve had lately and great crust!

We stopped in for lunch during during a "roadtrip" after reading the positive reviews. I had the Taco Pizza and my wife had the pepperoni pizza (how plain, I know üòÅ). The pizzas were very good (it's hard to mess up a pizza though). The ‚Ä¶
Had a Classic 14 inch Pizza it was very good this place is a real time capsel they have not changed much in forty years.  They have some good beers on tap also.

Pizza was very good and I would recommend coming here instead of the awful new Za's place across the street. Crust was great and lots of cheese on the pizza. Even a small was a pretty good amount and only $7. Service was a little slow and it was very loud inside. However, it was still a great experience.
If you are ever around Lake Barkley/Kentucky Lake area check out Pagliai's Pizza of Princeton.  Always a treat!

Order pizza from this place they said 45 mins to an HR and came an hour and 20 mins late. Tipped them over the phone when I ordered my pizza and it arrived with no toppings on a slice. Like it was scraped off with someone's finger or something. Disgusting and horrible service I took a photo
Long time favorite. Haven't stopped in for a long time but still exactly as it should be. Great pizza and cheese bread with awesome service!

Just fantastic pizza and surprisingly fast service on a busy Saturday afternoon. We ordered two pies, because my kids are big eaters, and after we finished the bacon cheeseburger pizza, which was absolutely fantastic, we didn‚Äôt get close on ‚Ä¶

A very laid back place to enjoy a family dinner, or meet up with friends. They have the most amazing mozzarella cheese that they put on their cheesy bread, pizzas, sandwiches. The Noon Time one-topping pizza and pop special is awesome. Our ‚Ä¶

Now keep in mind this is our first and only visit...

The pizza was great! Heard some hype from somewhere (can't remember where) and ‚Ä¶
Excellent pizza and friendly staff. Nothing fancy inside but also good beer.
Welp, I finally found the best pizza in New Ulm. It's in Mankato, right here @ Pagliai's. Worth the drive. Comparable to NY pizza's, so don't hesitate.
Corner stone in the community that stands the test of time. Pizza üçï of great reputation since 1969. Delicious üòã ‚Ä¶

I've been going to Pagliai's for a long time. You just can't beat their pizza. They don't skimp on ingredients and the cheese and sauce seal the deal. If you are in the Mankato area and want to try a great pizza, stop at Pagliai's.
Stumbled across this pizzeria while traveling. The pizza was so good, I may need to return to Mankato just to have more pizza! Plentiful toppings on not too thick, not too thin crust!
Man, that's some tasty pizza!  We had a 14 in works and a garlic cheese bread.  I have not had Pagliai's Pizza or Cheese Bread since 1992.   Truly amazing stuff!

Arrived at 11:45 on Thursday for lunch. Decided to get my pizza to go. Was told 30-40 minutes, which for most people would make it difficult to eat lunch. Now 50 minutes into my visit and still no food. Don't come for lunch!!!
Had a cold poorboy and it was so amazing, yet simple. Definitely a highlight from a weekend in Mankato.
Awesome pizza in a great downtown location.  We will definitely be back!
I have eaten in their restaurant, gotten delivery and most recently curbside takeout. Each time the pizza was delicious and for the most part the staff was polite and service was prompt. ‚Ä¶
Best pizza I've had in a very long time. Craft beer on tap for $5. Will definitely be back.

Had my first visit today. Ordered the small Pagliais special pizza, the cheese pull was amazing. The small was plenty for 2 meals! Tried my dad's spaghetti and cheese bread which was known to have "scabs" ü§£. Was a plus to have an option for ‚Ä¶
The only solid pizza joint in Mankato. A great atmosphere for a casual, low key pizza and beer.  Decent crust, good cheese, and nice sauce. Beer good.

Steak and shrimp were tasty but the broccoli was pretty flavorless and you can't sub out the carrot "garnish" (or even leave it off the plate if you don't want it), which I wasn't a fan of, I don't like wasting food I know I won't eat. Service was great, the atmosphere was a little too dark for my taste.
The food is consistently good every time we eat here!! And you feel like you get a decent amount of food for the price! Wait staff is very nice and accommodating! Highly recommend this restaurant!

First time visit to Pappageorge.   As I told my group, this place is like a hole in the wall.  Nothing flashy to draw you in BUT it is one of the best places to go.  The food, service and atmosphere are awesome.  In the outskirts of Mankato and is a diamond in the rough.  Will come back on my next business trip!
The food is excellent! If you hit it during rush hour, the service is a hair below "on spot". Overall, an amazing place to dine.

I heard about this place for a while, before finally finding it and checking it out myself. "Kind of a weird location" But we've gone twice and really enjoyed ourselves. We weren't that excited about the appetizers, but the main courses and deserts were done well at a fair price. I've recommended friends and family to check it out.

Our server was personable and didn't hesitate to do as asked but was not a nuisance. The food was fantastic and so were the drinks. I dined on an amazing filet mignon and was treated to a complementary slice of rich moist carrot cake as it ‚Ä¶

OH MY COD üò±

Alright alright I gotta scale down the puns üêü But there‚Äôs nothin‚Äô more ‚Ä¶

We were in this weekend and had a below average experience. Our server was rude when I asked for a drink recommendation. I enjoy trying special drinks that maybe they‚Äôd be known for, but instead I got looked at like I was stupid. We had a ‚Ä¶

This was our first time at this restaurant and bar. Tammy was our server. She kept our glasses full!  We ordered dinner which comes with a basket of some freshly baked bread. It was so nummy!  I ordered Fish and Chips, it was good.  The ‚Ä¶
All food was very good and, considering the high quality, a reasonable price. Filet mignon perfectly cooked, sides delicious, accommodating staff. A terrific, special family dinner.

Unfortunately, just as we were walking in with a party of four, we were informed something in the kitchen had broken. Because the Hostess had no idea how long any repairs might take, we decided not to wait. We've heard good things about ‚Ä¶

This was our first time eating here. The food was amazing. Steaks were cooked perfect. Carrots we're amazing. The shrimp bisque soup was very good also. We will definitely be back. Make a reservation.
Amazing first time we've been there and will definitely be returning!

Called prior and was told we didn‚Äôt need a reservation then was turned away at the door saying they were full when there were 4 open tables‚Ä¶. The hostess was very rude. Customer service was horrible. Was not able to try the food as I have heard the food is good.

Parking was slightly challenging,  but the service was good. They got our party off four in quickly.  I ordered pork  chops. While they looked good, they were dry. The veges were pretty good but need some seasoning.  The chops were so dry they were almost unpalatable.
Best steak in the area.   Best scallops ever.   Great meal.  Great service.

Always great food here and reasonably priced. Ben at the bar makes absolutely killer old fashioneds. Beautiful decor and friendly staff. It's perfect for date night or relaxed night. Don't sleep on this place, come get some wine, a cocktail, and have a wonderful dinner.

Outstanding! Great food, love the Tuesday night chicken parm. Great steaks, nail the temp every time. Excellent value related to price. Awesome staff, very welcoming and attentive. Whenever in the Mankato area, be sure to stop here.
Papageorge's is one of the best places in Mankato for a date night. I personally recommend the London Broil. It is delicious!
Great local spot. Customers playing games and working on pc. Very comfortable.

Stopped in here looking for an early lunch and was not disappointed! Don't judge this place on its humble appearance: where it lacks in aesthetic it makes up for it with a quiet dining experience, prompt service, and quality food. Boyfriend ‚Ä¶

The atmosphere was really nice, like a friend's house. The service was really good fast, as soon as I finished my water it was refilled. My walleye was cold and had little flavor, the steamed broccoli was cold, and the carrots were cold. The other steaks were under and over cooked. The food looked better than it was.
Some folks in our party liked the food, those that got the walleye and steak. Those of us that got pasta thought it was overcooked and tasted bland. Service was great....atmosphere was okay.
Nice place. Was busy so recommend reservations. Good was fantastic! One of the best steaks ever had! Highly recommend

Great American cuisine. We had the black and blue burger and the broccoli asiago pasta. The burger was cooked perfectly with some sparky flavor to it! Service was timely and friendly. Atmosphere was clean and welcoming.

One of my favorite places in town! Never been served a bad meal and Papageorge's service is always top notch.  My favorite meal is the Wild Mushroom Ravioli with Filet medallions.  The perfect balance of portions and flavor!

This place is consistently great.  Service is always good- food is always delicious.  Bartender and wait staff make you feel like you‚Äôre family!  Make a reservation as the restaurant is often full!  This speaks to the quality and popularity of PappaGeorge!  Love it here!!!

Stopped in for lunch while we were in Mankato for an appointment.  Deceiving from the outside, but as soon as you walk in, you feel this is a local favorite.  We were warmly greeted and shown a table.   My husband loved the wings, and the ‚Ä¶

When you‚Äôre in Mankato or Madison Lake, do yourself a favor and come here for dinner. The whole time I was here, all the bar, grills and restaurants served nothing put high fat, high cholesterol, awful food. Not a salad or veggie in site. ‚Ä¶

We found this place in a search and it was highly recommended. We visited for dinner on a Wednesday night. We were asked if we had a reservation, but we didn't need one. We were seated right inside the door, which made conversation a little ‚Ä¶

Very delicious. I had the fish and chips which was out of this world. The atmosphere was subdued and quaint, yet extremely packed so you know it's a good place. I'll probably come back to it next time I am in the Mankato area.

Decent place, cute. Great servers! Went for lunch on the weekday was busy. Food was good, felt it was very basic but definitely good to eat. Decided to visit because of the high ratings. Great waiter and waitress! ‚Ä¶
Just had the best steak in town.  Perfectly prepared.  Very friendly and professional staff, warm atmosphere.  Our entire table enjoyed their experience.  Highly recommend.

My wife and I have tried this place twice, both times we received the same service. We were made to wait close to an hour for a table despite having made reservations, all the while watching multiple groups who obviously knew the service ‚Ä¶

We went at 3 pm on a Friday restaurant was dead silent and we were the only pair in for a while, service was excellent, but I cannot say the same about the food. Fried cauliflower appetizer was bland, cauliflower was somehow still raw, and ‚Ä¶

This was my first time at Papa George's and I loved it!  The food was good, the server we had was awesome üëå üëè
I can hardly wait to go backüòä ‚Ä¶
The Pappageorge burger was absolutely amazing! The shrimp bisque was ok. My wife did not love the garlic chicken, nice quaint spot. Not bad.
It's definitely not a country club atmosphere. Jumbo shrimp = average size. Food was good. Service was fine. Cheap string lights hanging around the bar, not sure why, looked tacky.
This is a great place,  food and service was very good.  Prices were fair. Servings were nice size.

Absolutely zero complaints about this cool spot! Atmosphere is fun, staff is super friendly and helpful. Had the mushroom ravioli with artichoke hearts. The bread and oil might have been my favorite part.
We had the 2 pasta dishes, both excellent. The bread before the meal was fresh and delicious. The butter was cold and didn't spread but that was minor.

We have a group of ladies that eat lunch here once a month and then play cards. Today the owner out of no where was extremely rude‚Ä¶we asked if we could put two 4 seats together to dine together and she said loud and very rudely..‚Äùabsolutely ‚Ä¶

Great food, good service. A couple days ago I had the lobster ravioli and today had the wolf mushroom ravioli. Both were fantastic. I definitely recommend you try this restaurant. You won't be disappointed.

This truly is a hidden gem in Mankato. The fish and chips are very good. The turkey pasta salad is probably the best thing on the menu and it is so light and excellent to eat. The only ding I will give the place is the last time I was there ‚Ä¶

Consistently shows why they are best dining experience.  Menu is superb and prepared exceptionally well, atmosphere is intimate and cozy. Service is equally as great as the food.  Easily the best dining around!

I ate here for the first time a couple months ago and I cannot stop thinking about the mushroom ravioli, it is that good! We ate here during the busy dinner rush and the only negative thing I have to say is the seating is a little tight and parking can be a bit of a challenge during that time. Overall it was an excellent experience!
Food was delicious. Service was excellent.
The food was quite good and the service was excellent.

This is a smallish restaurant, booking is advised. It is closed more often than most, check the times.
Lunch is average but dinner is outstanding. There‚Äôs nothing here that wasn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶

Everything was absolutely excellent! The steak was cooked perfectly, the mashed potatoes were delicious, and the bread pudding was out of this world. Definitely try this place! I will definitely come back!

Had an amazing server. Jeff S. , you were amazing at making our experience wonderful. The cooks did amazing with perfection plating. Ordered a steak medium rare, which was cooked to perfection. Loved the cleaniless, and atmosphere vibe.

Visiting from out of town. Here on a work trip and I have to say it was an absolute joy having Josh servicing our group. Extremely helpful and knowledgeable on the dishes. Appetizers were great the cheese curds had a honey glaze that ‚Ä¶

Pros:
-Friendly server.
-Romantic, cozy atmosphere. ‚Ä¶

The food and customer service was outstanding, we had Josh as our server he was exceptional! We ordered the calamari, steak queso, oysters, lobster bisque and Cesar salad for starters. Ordered the wagyu burger for my entree. Chef didn‚Äôt miss! Lemon drops were amazing! Would return and highly recommend.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: If you haven‚Äôt visited the Moose in awhile, don‚Äôt expect what you used to know it to be. The service was mediocre, food was poor, and the prices didn‚Äôt account for any of that. ‚Ä¶

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Fish was way over cooked. Baked potato wasn't even warn enough to melt my butter. salad bar was gross looking. Service was slow. And when they asked out our food we told them it wasn't very good. Server didn't even acknowledge us. Never again.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: We bring a group of about 40 every other month to chat, eat drink and be merry and the staff never lets us down. Dan jas been fabulous at making sure we have enough space and the wait staff dedicated to us is always top notch

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: They have a nice semi private facility for private parties and receptions.  They have fairly large dance floor and stage area. Everything is decorated in a rustic red log lodge look. But it's well done. ‚Ä¶

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Good food, great place.  They used to have the best ribs but they switched to making them in an electric smoker or something.  Way too smoky and not as tender or flavorful... but otherwise it's good.  If you get prime rib (not smoked.. that ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Food was great! They were busy when we arrived,  but because it's such a large place, and they appeared fully staffed it didn't feel busy at all. Was seated right away. Not a long wait for our food. Friendly staff. Even though a large conference center that can host lots of people,  it felt like a home town diner!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Very calm environment.  Staff is kind and attentive. Our food was served quickly and as ordered. Overall, a very nice experience!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Great friendly staff. We both had Prime Rib which was very good. Soup and salad bar with homemade mashed potatoes. You cant go wrong stopping here for drink, food or both!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text:
The waitress was so nice and polite...

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: I had the 1/2 order of nachos and split it with a friend. It was more than enough. So fresh and tasty.  We also ordered a Turkey club sandwich to share and decided to take it for supper tonight. I'm sure it's going to be fabulous.  Price was not bad either.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Good food and drinks at a reasonable price. Most Fridays have live music with no cover.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Large party room, food supplied was really good. Pool tables were well maintained. Karoke was very well run. Good staff, super attentive server was always there all evening long. Would recommend.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Had a very nice experience. This restaurant offers a soup and salad bar that was excellent. Cocktails were perfect and bar staff very friendly with good menu advice

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Fun hockey bar located right by ice arena.  General bar food as well as some good prime rib.  Limited menu during events but is the place to be on game nights.  Solid and friendly service even when busy.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Friendly staff and great service. Soup and salad bar is available and very good. Ordered burgers and chicken sandwiches which were great as well. We've been there multiple times and are never disappointed.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Our server was prompt and courteous.  We were here on a Friday night was pretty busy but there were no problems or complaints on our end. You have to try the steak dinner!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Was at a wedding here. Absolutely amazing. Great staff and vibe. Friendly and accommodating. Let us party longer than what was booked. ‚Ä¶

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Great prices, great food! Dan and Woody are fantastic bartenders. Try the brisket or the prime rib you will be glad you did.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Good food. Drinks are a little expensive. Karaoke nearly every Friday and Saturday night. The staff is also great during events. The conference room is very spacious.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text:
My wife got the commercial which was amazing.
I got the wings which were also great. Especially the breaded wings. Staff was friendly and attentive. Will return if I ever come in town again.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: In the same night, we were served raw hamburgers, followed by burnt cookies.  The wait staff has challenges giving service, even when hardly anyone in bar.  I would not recommend this place, as it leaves a lot to be desired.  Go spend your money somewhere else.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: This place is HUGE! There's a ton of different sections, so if you'd rather relax with some friends in a quiet corner, you can generally find one. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: We frequent Loose Moose on Thursdays for their $10 taco/salad bar and trivia. It's a really fun inexpensive way to have a great time on a work/school night.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Very fun trivia at 6:30 on Thursday. They also have karaoke on Friday and sometimes Saturday. Their sweet potato fries dipped in their chipotle ranch are PHENOMENAL!

Review Text: Some of the best food in Mankato. love the ever-changing daily specials and the delicious & affordable taco bar. often find myself coming here once a week for lunch. Highly recommended!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Excellent food, salad bar was fresh. Servers were very friendly.  We would definitely go back.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: First time here. Nice waleye meal perfectly cooked. Our service was very excellent. We will be back. I am looking forward to trying the prime rib

Review Text: Great pizza fast service! All you can eat taco bar some day! The woody is a great all meat pizza that's a must try for meat lovers!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Wow, the soups- chicken wild rice and the chili were great! Salad bar had good choices and the beer was crispy cold.. we'll stop again!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Food was good but service very very slow when we were 1 of 3 tables in the whole place ‚Ä¶

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: It was a great night with trivia, good friends,  and terrific food.  You have to try the  pulled pork flatbread! Nummy!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Didn't eat but the salad bar looked fresh and fantastic. Mikey was amazing!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: It is the only place to be on Maverick home hockey game nights. Really good food, reasonable prices. And don't forget 2 for 1 drink specials.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Good food! Plenty of options to choose from. The salad bar is always tasty.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: The food was excellent . Service was a tad slow but it was busy . All in all it was a good experience.

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Really awesome place to grab a beer or cocktail and some really great food! Family friendly as well!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Great food, nice people. Overall good atmosphere

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Y'all are the best!! We had a party here tonight and we were so well taken care of for food and drinks!!!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: I had a great burger with brisket. It was very tasty.  I hope I can get back there soon!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Great supper at the Loose Moose!

Restaurant Name: The Loose Moose Saloon & Conference Center
Review Text: Really friendly staff. Great price on tap beer. Good place to have a special occasion.

Awesome owner, great pizza.

What's better than a burrito with cheese? One BATHED in cheese. A beast birthed at La Bamba, this behemoth means business and bueno flavor.

Review Text: BEST TACOS IN MANKATO! Been going to LaBamba for years and the food is top notch! Highly recommend the Bamba Nachos loaded with everything. You get a LOT of food so be prepared! Don't bother with the other Taco places in Mankato. This place is the real deal!

Review Text: Ordered the 3 taco meal and the 3 enchilada meal. Both were very affordable and delicious. The food tasted authentic with just the right amount of spice. Highly recommend this place.

Review Text: A must stop at this lil hole in the wall restaurant, flavor and quality is outstanding. Portions will feed you for days    my personal favorite is the Wet Burrito packed with flavor. Keep up the good work making outstanding food

We had a large order this weekend for a gymnastics team and the staff was very accommodating and great to work with. The pizza came quickly and was delicious!
